dc_title_s: Twin Cities Metropolitan Area Regional Groundwater Flow Model Results, Version 2.00 (Metro Model 2): Metro Twin Cities, Minnesota
dc_description_s: This metadata record provides an index to datasets generated by the Twin Cities Metropolitan Area Regional Groundwater Flow Model. The 2005 Minnesota Legislature directed the Metropolitan Council to "carry out planning activities addressing the water supply needs of the metropolitan area" (Minnesota Statutes, Section 473.1565). Specifically the Council is charged with developing a base of technical information for water supply planning decisions and to prepare a metropolitan area master water supply plan. This dataset supports this charge.Links below contain additional information relating to each dataset :1. Regional Groundwater Flow Model Boundary (polygon)2.
